_With his well-worn plate armor and mighty shield, this tall figure appears ready to stand against any foe._ Even with the fall of the nation of Lastwall, many people still dedicate their lives to opposing the forces and schemes of the Whispering Tyrant. Styling themselves the Shining Sentinels, they see themselves as a bulwark against the further spread of the Tyrant's influence. When not rallying troops to battle against their sworn foe or protecting villages from undead incursions, these knights travel the Inner Sea in hopes of recruiting other righteous souls to fight against the undead hordes. Many Shining Sentinels are servants of good deities, such as Iomedae; in battle, they turn their god-given powers against their foes. These virtuous warriors put the safety of their companions before their own and often hold defensive positions to protect their allies. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Virtuous Defender](/NPCs.aspx?ID=969) **Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 122 2.0 **Perception** +10 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Varisian](/Languages.aspx?ID=44) **Skills** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Shining Crusade Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9 **Str** +4 **Dex** +0 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +3 **Items** [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 7, HP 30, BT 15) --- **AC** 22 (24 with shield raised) **Fort** +12 **Ref** +6 (+9 vs. damaging effects) **Will** +12 **HP** 70 **Shield Ally** The virtuous defender's shield is studier in their hands. The statistics for the shield above include this benefit; it's a normal steel shield for anyone else.
**[Retributive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=31)** The virtuous defender can Step to put the foe in reach before making a melee Retributive Strike.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** longsword +12 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+6 slashing **Ranged** composite longbow +8 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8+4 piercing **Champion Devotion Spells** DC 19, 1 Focus Point - **2nd** [Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395), [Veil of Confidence](/Spells.aspx?ID=466)
Avill Ransford When Avill's sister chose the path of the crusader, Avill was supportive, eagerly reading all of his sister's letters about her training and religious studies. The final missive Avill received was bursting with pride, as his sister reported that she had been assigned to Vigil. Only months later, Tar-Baphon destroyed the city. Avill now wields a sword in his sister's honor and in his sister's place.
name: Virtuous Defender
